## EmailAuthProvider.providerId property

Always set to [ProviderId.PASSWORD](./auth-types.providerid.password.md)<!-- -->, even for email link.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
readonly providerId = externs.ProviderId.PASSWORD;
```
